page.title: 08TOURISM
page.content: The Camber Sands Leisure Centre is privately owned. There are 397 caravans of which all but 68 are owned by the individual holiday maker who rents the site. There are 600 chlats of which the company rents for the owners only 123. The maximum population is 3,500. The emphasis is on family holidays,it is a very relaxed place. There is a club housewith entertainers, a restaurant and a swimming pool with a tots & paddling pool. The seasonal employment is 30, with a permanent staff of 12. The camp is open from March 1st. to January 2nd. The length of life of the caravans is 1o years, the chalets are leased until 2003.
